Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GUIBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIBoard
public class GUIBoard extends Object
Class GUIBoard renders the board's elements on the screen For each player, a GUIBoard instance is assigned

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    addStudentToTable(Color student)
    Method addStudentToTable adds a student to the hashmap numOfStudentsOnTable which stores the number of students for each color client side It also refreshes table rendered items to show the newly added student
    void
    clearBoard(boolean reset)
    Method clearBoard removes all the board images from the screen
    private void
    clearLobby()
    Method clearLobby removes all the lobby student images from the screen
    private void
    clearTables()
    Method clearTables removes all the table student images from the screen
    private void
    clearTeachers()
    Method clearTeachers removes all the teachers images from the screen
    private void
    clearTowers()
    Method clearTowers removes all the towers images from the screen
    ClientBoard
    getClientBoard()
     
    private void
    initializeBoard()
    Method initializeBoard sets up the hashmap which associates Color->number of students and the lobby students list These two data structures can be modified freely on client side by drag n drop events, because the copies from server are stored in GameBoard instance
    boolean
    isLobbyModified()
     
    void
    populate()
    Method populate clear all the rendered items on the board and draws them again It also sets again drag n drop events on the table
    private void
    populateCoins()
    Method populateCoins adds a coin image to the board It also adds a tooltip which tells to the player how many coins does he have
    private void
    populateLobby()
    Method populateLobby adds all the student images to the lobby If a drag n drop event has removed one or more students from the lobby's students list, they will be rendered even if these are still in lobby, server-side.
    private void
    populateTables()
    Method populateTables adds all the student images to the table If a drag n drop event has added one or more students to the table's students hashmap, they will be rendered even if these are still in lobby, server-side.
    private void
    populateTeachers()
    Method populateTeachers adds all the teachers images to the board Each image is rendered if and only if the board's owner has that specific teacher
    private void
    populateTowers()
    Method populateTowers adds all the towers images to the board
    private void
    reset()
    Method reset clears lobby students list and table hashmap and calls initialization This is called when it's needed to synchronize board status between GUI client and server after a drag n drop event which modified the board client side
    private void
    setTableEvents()
    Method setTableEvents sets up drag n drop events for the table

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GUIBoard

      public GUIBoard(ClientBoard clientBoard, GUI gui, GameTableController controller, javafx.scene.image.ImageView tableBounds)

  • Method Details

    • initializeBoard

      private void initializeBoard()
      Method initializeBoard sets up the hashmap which associates Color->number of students and the lobby students list These two data structures can be modified freely on client side by drag n drop events, because the copies from server are stored in GameBoard instance

    • setTableEvents

      private void setTableEvents()
      Method setTableEvents sets up drag n drop events for the table

    • addStudentToTable

      private void addStudentToTable(Color student)
      Method addStudentToTable adds a student to the hashmap numOfStudentsOnTable which stores the number of students for each color client side It also refreshes table rendered items to show the newly added student
      Parameters:
      student - color of the student to add to the hashmap

    • populate

      public void populate()
      Method populate clear all the rendered items on the board and draws them again It also sets again drag n drop events on the table

    • populateTeachers

      private void populateTeachers()
      Method populateTeachers adds all the teachers images to the board Each image is rendered if and only if the board's owner has that specific teacher

    • populateLobby

      private void populateLobby()
      Method populateLobby adds all the student images to the lobby If a drag n drop event has removed one or more students from the lobby's students list, they will be rendered even if these are still in lobby, server-side. This is done to preview what the board will look like if the player decides to confirm his action

    • populateTables

      private void populateTables()
      Method populateTables adds all the student images to the table If a drag n drop event has added one or more students to the table's students hashmap, they will be rendered even if these are still in lobby, server-side. This is done to preview what the board will look like if the player decides to confirm his action

    • populateTowers

      private void populateTowers()
      Method populateTowers adds all the towers images to the board

    • populateCoins

      private void populateCoins()
      Method populateCoins adds a coin image to the board It also adds a tooltip which tells to the player how many coins does he have

    • clearLobby

      private void clearLobby()
      Method clearLobby removes all the lobby student images from the screen

    • clearTables

      private void clearTables()
      Method clearTables removes all the table student images from the screen

    • clearTeachers

      private void clearTeachers()
      Method clearTeachers removes all the teachers images from the screen

    • clearTowers

      private void clearTowers()
      Method clearTowers removes all the towers images from the screen

    • getClientBoard

      public ClientBoard getClientBoard()

    • clearBoard

      public void clearBoard(boolean reset)
      Method clearBoard removes all the board images from the screen

    • isLobbyModified

      public boolean isLobbyModified()

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Method reset clears lobby students list and table hashmap and calls initialization This is called when it's needed to synchronize board status between GUI client and server after a drag n drop event which modified the board client side
